items.sentence: It hasn\'t been easy for Tom to make ends meet.
She assisted her mother in caring for the baby.
She feeds her dog the same thing that she eats.
Tom is in prison for a crime he didn\'t commit.
Tom is the only person I\'ve ever really hated.
Tom listened carefully to everything Mary said.
Tom lit the candle and then blew out the match.
Tom looked at the thermometer on his dashboard.
Tom looked very tired when I saw him yesterday.
Tom can\'t believe Mary let herself get caught.
